name: Mutant Mayhem
description:
Click anywhere on the screen to move, when not moving you will attack.

Beat up mutated critters in this endless dungeon romp.

Originally made in 72 hours for Mini-Jam 76
Theme: Radiation
Limitation: One Handed Controls.
Programming, Design, by Michael Williams - Bouncing Turtle
Characters by https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/
Weapons by https://snoopethduckduck.itch.io/
